# demopkg

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of demopkg is to practice making a package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of demopkg like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("debruine/demopkg")
```


```{r, eval= FALSE}
library(demopkg)
```
